message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,000?
I understand your desire to save, Bob, but $14,000 is already a competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
